titles: A bosome opened to the Jewes holding forth to others some reasons for our receiving them into our nation.
author: Tomlinson, William.
publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert, at the Black-spread-Eagle at the west end of Pauls,
notes: Annotation on Thomason copy: "January 12 1655"; the 6 in the date has been crossed out and replaced with a 5.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
